attributes.action: Increase Budget For ALL of the UK's Armed Forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are going to war, with a few countries, and have numerous task force engagements abroad, yet we fail to understand that OUR FORCES ARE OVER STRETCHED. various military leaders have spoken out, on poor kit, lack of equipment, the lack of defence in our OWN country. We send men to die in wars, the least we can do is protect them. Our navy is tiny, our airforce is shrinking, our army is seriously under-equipped. STOP MURDERING OUR TROOPS AND PROTECT THEM
